summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 1998 FORD CONTOUR.  THE CONTACT DISCOVERED THAT THE  RIGHT FRONT TIRE WAS FLAT.  IN THE PROCESS OF FIXING  THE TIRE THE CONTACT REALIZED THAT THE RIGHT FRONT COIL SPRING DETACHED AND PUNCTURED THE TIRE.  THE DEALER WAS CONTACTED REGARDING THE COIL SPRING.  THERE WAS RECALL # 01I013000.  HOWEVER, THIS VEHICLE WAS NOT INCLUDED.  THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGE WERE 81,320.AK
